activities: Teleflex acquires processes and maintains employment related personal data about our employees in order to exercise our responsibilities under applicable employment laws,  for general human resources administration, and for processing non-sensitive personal information gained through Corporate Business Ethics and Compliance surveys and training programs.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Teleflex is not a member of any privacy program relative to safe harbor.
recoursemech: Teleflex is committed to cooperating with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) in the investigation and resolution of complaints brought under Safe Harbor in order to satisfy Safe Harbor Enforcement Principles, specifically (a) and (c).
